thread.title: Parenting classes to be held at Effingham YMCA
thread.title_full: Parenting classes to be held at Effingham YMCA | savannahnow.com

author: Effingham Now
title: Parenting classes to be held at Effingham YMCA
text:
Photos By Effingham Now
“Love and Logic” parenting classes will be offered once a week for a six-week period starting Nov. 5, at the Effingham YMCA in Rincon. New sessions will be held each quarter.
The Love and Logic method uses consequences and the child’s decision-making to achieve the results of respectful and healthy relationships between parents and children.
Cost is $35 per couple or $25 per individual. Class size is limited to five couples or 10 individuals.
Classes are on Thursdays from 6:30 p.m. to 8 p.m.
Childcare is available for children age 10 years and younger at a cost of $6 per hour per child. Advance notice is required for childcare.
For reservations call: 912-826-5300 ext. 100 or email rgerrald@uwce.org.
Partners for the classes are the United Way of the Coastal Empire, Family Promise, the Effingham County School System and the Effingham YMCA.
The YMCA is located at 1224 Patriot Drive, Rincon.
